songs.title: Split Personality
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I do not trust, so I cannot love (Can't no man be trusted)
Oh, no, no, no
And I would not dare to open up (This life of yours is dusted, P!nk)
Well my rent is past due and now my car would not start
I hate the bus (Well aren't you glad you have somebody to talk to?)
Tell me what do they see when they look at me
Do they see my many personalities?

[Chorus]
Can you help me?
Does anybody hear me?
Can they even see me?
This is my reality, oh, oh

[Verse 2]
(Can it be my turn now? Is it my turn, P!nk?)
Said I will say it again, you are my only friend
(I protect you from the world, I basically protect you from yourself)
Though I can't go on, I am not satisfied with this being the end
(This is just the beginning)

[Pre-Chorus]
Tell me why can't I just reach up and simply touch the sky
Tell me why I can't spread my arms and fly and fly and fly
Tell me why can't I say this, why can't I do that
Tell me what they want from me, tell me how to act

[Chorus]
Can you help me?
Does anybody hear me?
Can they even see me?
This is my reality, oh, oh
Can you help me?
Does anybody hear me?
Can they even see me?
This is my reality, oh, oh

[Bridge]
So I am putting it all on the table (Tell them, P!nk)
You do not know me well enough to label me
Sick, or even disturbed
When you break it down I am just two girls
Trying to blend, trying to vibe (Trying)
Trying to live just one life (So hard)
Everybody is got insanities, I got a split personality

[Pre-Chorus]
Tell me why can't I just reach up and simply touch the sky (Why can't you)
Tell me why I can't spread my arms and fly and fly and fly (You can)
Tell me why can't I say this, why can't I do that (Just do it)
Tell me what do they want from me, tell me how to act (I can't, I can't)

[Chorus]
Can you help me?
Does anybody hear me?
Can they even see me?
This is my reality, oh, oh
Can you help me?
Does anybody hear me?
Can they even see me?
This is my reality, oh, oh
Can you help me?
Does anybody hear me?
Can they even see me?
This is my reality, oh, oh

[Outro]
Can you help me
(Talk to me, talk to me, do not ignore me, I can't take it)
Do you hear me?
Do you see me every time?
(Oh calm down, it is not that serious, we will be just fine without them)
It is all mine, it is my reality it is just too much for me
(You are my friend, you are my friend, P!nk! P!nk!)
